items.content_html: Harpia Core is the foundational module of the Harpia Framework, designed exclusively for the Bun runtime. Like Express, Fastify, or Hono, it can be used independently, offering a lightweight yet powerful foundation for building modern web applications optimized for Bun.
items.title: harpia-framework/core: Harpia Core is the foundational module of the Harpia Framework, designed exclusively for the Bun runtime. Like Express, Fastify, or Hono, it can be used independently, offering a lightweight yet powerful foundation for building modern web applications optimized for Bun.

items.content_html: Ta5beesScript is an open-source, lightweight scripting language designed for clarity, expressiveness, and developer happiness. Built with Arabeezi syntax in mind, it blends humor, cultural relevance, and technical robustness to create a language that's not just fun but also functional and usable by Arabic-speaking programmers worldwide.
items.title: hkurdi/Ta5beesScript: Ta5beesScript is an open-source, lightweight scripting language designed for clarity, expressiveness, and developer happiness. Built with Arabeezi syntax in mind, it blends humor, cultural relevance, and technical robustness to create a language that's not just fun but also functional and usable by Arabic-speaking programmers worldwide.

items.content_html: A lightweight Node.js application to schedule and send HTTP requests to any URL at specified intervals. Powered by Express, Axios, and node-cron, this tool is perfect for automating API calls, monitoring, and more.

items.content_html: Change String Case is a lightweight JavaScript utility for effortless string case conversions. Whether you need snake_case, kebab-case, camelCase, or PascalCase, this tool streamlines the formatting process. Enhance your coding workflow with a user-friendly interface, single-click conversions, and seamless clipboard copying.
items.title: Karl-Horning/change-string-case: Change String Case is a lightweight JavaScript utility for effortless string case conversions. Whether you need snake_case, kebab-case, camelCase, or PascalCase, this tool streamlines the formatting process. Enhance your coding workflow with a user-friendly interface, single-click conversions, and seamless clipboard copying.
